summary: Modern, premium real estate website for STATEGURD company offering property buying, selling, renting, and consultancy services with professional design focused on trust and lead generation
architectural_notes: Design uses navy blue, gold, and white color scheme
Clean layout with strong typography and minimal colors
Focus on trustworthy, secure, elegant, and corporate aesthetic
Lead generation and trust-building as primary goals
Area names link to dedicated property listing sections or pages
Smooth scroll and page transitions for enhanced navigation UX

existing_features.title: Create a hero section with the headline 'Secure Your Property Future with STATEGURD', subheadline 'Trusted Real Estate Solutions for Buying, Selling & Investment.', and a prominent 'Get a Free Consultation' call-to-action button
Create an About Us section that explains STATEGURD's professionalism, transparency, and market expertise in the real estate industry
Create a Services section showcasing four service offerings: Property Buying Assistance, Property Selling Services, Rental Management, and Investment Consultancy
Create a Featured Properties section with a property cards layout displaying available real estate listings
Create a Why Choose Us section highlighting four key differentiators: Market Expertise, Transparent Process, Client-Centered Approach, and Secure Transactions
Create a Testimonials section to display client reviews and build social proof
Create a Contact section with an inquiry form that collects Name, Phone, Email, and Property Interest fields to generate leads
Implement fully responsive design ensuring the website displays correctly and maintains usability across mobile, tablet, and desktop devices

Apply a premium, professional design system using navy blue, gold, and white as the primary color palette with clean typography, elegant spacing, and a corporate aesthetic that conveys trust and security
Optimize content with SEO-friendly heading structure (H1, H2, H3) and maintain a professional business tone throughout all copy to support lead generation goals

Convert all area names displayed in the Featured Properties section (e.g., 'Gulshan', 'Banani', 'Dhanmondi') into clickable links that navigate users to filtered property listings for that specific area
Create a dynamic area landing page or filterable section that displays property listings filtered by the selected area name, with URL routing support for direct access to area-specific property views

Style clickable area name links with clear visual indicators including hover underline, distinct color (navy blue or gold from STATEGURD brand palette), and sufficient contrast to indicate interactivity
Implement smooth scroll behavior or page transitions when navigating between the main property listing view and area-specific filtered views to enhance user experience

new_feature_requests.summary: Hero section with headline, subheadline, and CTA button
About Us section explaining professionalism and market expertise
Services section with four service types
Featured Properties section with property cards layout
Why Choose Us section with four key highlights
Make area names clickable with links to property listings by area
Create dynamic landing pages for each real estate area
Style clickable area links with hover effects and clear visual indicators
Add smooth scroll or page transitions for area navigation
